item.title: CSCO
item.description: score:165 Chances: Advancements in artificial intelligence have been one of the biggest stories of 2023 and remain a trending topic for 2024. The popularity of generative AI will impact companies like Verizon Communications (VZ), which controls the wireless networks that will transmit a lot of data.

item.title: S
item.description: score:20 Chances: The cybersecurity industry has been experiencing rapid growth, with increased demand for advanced technologies like AI for tackling next-generation threats. Risks: There have been significant insider sell transactions in SentinelOne Inc, which may raise concerns about the stock’s future performance.
